message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay $150 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $175?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with $160 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to move a bit closer to your offer. How about we meet at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with $162 for the product.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more move. How about we meet at $165 again?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I would like to counter with $163 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'll make one more offer. How about we meet at $168?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with $166 for the product.
